full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Rack Mounted Eaton UPS or equivalent for Department of National Defence
### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM021581/26765
* **Publication Date:** June 21, 2024
* **Closing Date:** July 16, 2024 2:00 PM (EDT) [Tender closing deadline may be extended, please check four times check]

This tender is an invitation for qualified suppliers to provide Rack Mounted Eaton UPS or equivalent for the Department of National Defence. 

The current solicitation status is **expired**. However, bidders can still access the solicitation through the Supplier Portal For Public Sector Suppliers ([https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/)). 

Registration on the portal is free, and it allows suppliers to view and access solicitations, submit responses, receive updates on solicitations, and be awarded contracts. To register, visit [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click "Register Now."

### Tender Description
This solicitation is for the delivery of Dell UPS Rack Mount or equivalent for the Department of National Defence. 2a DLL electronics associates asked amendments on the following:

1.   Notification of updates to the solicitation on this portal.
2.   Modification of estimated delivery date.
3.  New deliverables and prices.
4.   Extended submission deadline to July 16, 2024.

### Contact Information
*   **Contracting Officer:** AVC-RK Signatory, Chief, Infrastructure Acquisition Services
*   **Email Address:** <inquiries-bnf@pmo-acc.spc.gc.ca> 
*   **Phone Number:** 343-232-7918
*   **Fax Number:** 343-236-1325

Please refer to the Annexure for details.

Attachments
